Hey everyone, I've just finished formalizing the classic analysis result that l^1 space of the absolutely summable sequences is isometrically isomorphic to dual space of bounded sequences converging to 0. The code is in here:
https://github.com/BryceT233/l1-ismorphic-to-c0-dual/tree/main
Are there any related results in Mathlib that I could have used to simplify this?
